list.name: netapp
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES from poller WITH KEY="name"

list.name: SVM
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM nfsv3 WITH KEY=svm WHERE "name" =~ /$netapp/

list.name: node
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM nfsv3 WITH KEY="node" WHERE "name" =~ /$netapp/

list.name: volume
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM vol WITH KEY="volume" WHERE "name" =~ /$netapp/ and "svm" =~  /$SVM/

list.name: aggregate
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM aggr WITH KEY="aggregate" WHERE "name" =~ /$netapp/ and "node" =~  /$node/
